Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook.internal

Class SemesterGradesTable

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook.internal.SemesterGradesTable
public class SemesterGradesTable extends Object
An immutable class which takes the responsibility of storing data of all the marks of a specified semester. May be instatiated only by AcademicProgressEvaluator, and, accordingly, RecordBook.

Able to return current semesterNo, string representation by toString() and calculate gradePointAverage(). The copy of whole grades table may be instantiated by marks. amountOfMarks() returns a total amount of marks, and amountOfMarks() returns an amount of marks equal to specified Mark.

    • semesterNo

      public int semesterNo()
      Returns the number of semester to which this SemesterGradesTable is related.

      If this table is one with final grades, returns current semester number (determined by AcademicProgressEvaluator).

      the semesterNo
